title: looking for a friend to play with xxx
body:
Hey there, I'm a support main looking for preferably an adc to level my account up to 30 and then play some ranked x

would love it if they were non toxic, friendly and competitive!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :D

my account name is: ataintedrose add me xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

replies.body: hey i play adc, and mid. i sent a friend request your way my username is DeathHasCome
I like to play, but I recently only play Aram for many reasons, if you are interested i'd love to play with u
